Data.Name: ApplicationName
Data.Notes: Payment Processor

Data.Name: EmailServer
Data.Notes: Mail server

Data.Name: Email_NetworkCredential_Username
Data.Notes: Email / username at to send email

Data.Name: Email_NetworkCredential_Password
Data.Notes: Email / username at to send email

Data.Name: EmailServerPort
Data.Notes: Port number for ongoing email

Data.Name: IsOutgoingEmailLog
Data.Notes: If yes, we save all outgoing email on email manager to database table

Data.Name: OutgoingEmailFrom
Data.Notes: For generic email sender, we use this email

Data.Name: IncomingEmailToFromPublic
Data.Notes: For generic email to, we use this email

Data.Name: OutgoingEmailFromDisplayName
Data.Notes: For generic email sender, we use this email

Data.Name: DevelopmentEmail
Data.Notes: This is just for development. For developer, put your email here with your machine name.

Data.Name: BillingEmail
Data.Notes: On development, all emails still going to DevelopmentEmail.

Data.Name: EmailTemplate_NewInTransitPayment
Data.Notes: This is a email template from local file. If it is editable, the content can be edit from the website, but not the file.

Data.Name: EmailTemplate_BackdoorLink
Data.Notes: This is a email template from local file. If it is editable, the content can be edit from the website, but not the file.

Data.Name: EmailTemplate_PaymentDecline
Data.Notes: This is a email template from local file. If it is editable, the content can be edit from the website, but not the file.

Data.Name: EmailTemplate_PaymentPaid
Data.Notes: This is a email template from local file. If it is editable, the content can be edit from the website, but not the file.

Data.Name: EmailTemplate_InvoiceInfo
Data.Notes: This is a email template from local file. If it is editable, the content can be edit from the website, but not the file.

Data.Name: IsEmailManagerUsingWTECommunication
Data.Notes: If this is true, sending email will use WTE Communication webservice below. If false, SMTP server,port,username may needed.

Data.Notes: PayTraceURL for siteID 24, tanner
